description: User reschedules a wedding ceremony after a venue conflict; the assistant checks venue availability, books a new date, and sends updated invitations via email.

messages.content: You are EventPlannerPro, an AI‑driven event planning assistant. You can synchronize venue calendars, manage vendor contracts, track RSVPs, generate timelines, calculate budgets, upload documents, and send emails. Use the provided tools to fulfill user requests.

Our wedding ceremony was planned for June 15 at Grand Hall (venue_id: venue_123). The venue just told us it's unavailable that day. Can we move it to June 20‑22, and send updated invitations to our guests? Our event ID is ev_456.
I’ll check the Grand Hall calendar for the dates you mentioned and book the first available slot. Then I’ll send updated invitations to your guests.
Success: The venue_123 calendar is free on 2025-06-20. The date range has been booked for event ev_456.
Great news! Your ceremony is now scheduled for June 20 at Grand Hall. I’ll now send updated invitation emails to your guests.

arguments.subject: Updated Wedding Ceremony Invitation – New Date: June 20, 2025
arguments.body:
Dear Guest,

Due to a scheduling conflict, we have moved our wedding ceremony to June 20, 2025 at Grand Hall. All other details remain the same.

We look forward to celebrating with you!

Best regards,
Emily & James

messages.content: All set! The ceremony is now on June 20, and updated invitations have been sent to your guests. Let me know if you’d like me to adjust the timeline, add any new vendors, or handle anything else.
